title: View permissions in OO Workflow Designer
content:
This topic describes the permissions you can grant for Operations Orchestration (OO) Workflow Designer users.

Access and view the permissions

To access and view the permissions on IdM administration console:

  1. Click ORGANIZATION and select the Permissions section. The list of all the permissions currently set appears with the following parameters:
    1. NAME (DISPLAY NAME): Name of the set permission.
    2. DESCRIPTION: Description of the set permission.
    3. APPLICATION: The name of the application to which the permission is configured.
  2. Note the following default permissions that are non-editable:
    1. IDM_ADMIN: Performs IdM administration for consumer organization.
    2. ORG_ADMIN: Performs IdM administration for provider organization and its subordinate organizations.
    3. SUPER_IDM_ADMIN: Performs IdM administration for all organizations.

Search the permissions

To search existing permission:

  • In the upper-right corner, enter the permission name into the search bar, then click search   to perform the search.
